keyword: calories in 8 oz ny strip steak
title: Calories in 8 oz NY Strip Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in 8 oz ny strip steak, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
h1: Calories in 8 oz NY Strip Steak
assumptions: Boneless NY strip steak, USDA choice grade, cooked (grilled or broiled), trimmed to 1/8 inch external fat; no added oils, sauces, or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade, cooking method, fat trimming, and portion size. Values are averages; consult labels or USDA data for specifics.

quick_answer.text: An 8 oz NY strip steak provides ~615 kcal and ~56 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in 8 oz NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 615 kcal for an 8 oz cooked portion under standard assumptions.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 8 oz NY strip steak?
Does NY strip steak have carbs?
faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugarsâ€”it's nearly all protein and fat.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Grilling or broiling keeps calories lower; frying or adding fats increases them by 30-50 kcal per oz.

faqs.q: Is 8 oz NY strip steak high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, ~44 g total fat (18 g saturated), mostly from marbling; opt for lean cuts to reduce.
